name: scratch-gui
description: GraphicaL User Interface for creating and running Scratch 3.0 projects

scripts.clean: rimraf ./build && mkdirp build && rimraf ./dist && mkdirp dist
scripts.deploy: touch build/.nojekyll && gh-pages -t -d build -m "Build for $(git log --pretty=format:%H -n1)"
scripts.i18n:src: rimraf ./translations/messages/src && babel src > tmp.js && rimraf tmp.js && build-i18n-src ./translations/messages/src ./translations/ && npm run i18n:push
scripts.test: npm run test:lint && npm run test:unit && npm run build && npm run test:integration

author: Massachusetts Institute of Technology
